text: "Savage Love (Laxed – Siren Beat)", also known as "Savage Love", is a 2020 song by New Zealand record producer Jawsh 685 and American singer Jason Derulo. It topped the single charts in Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Israel, Mexico, the Netherlands, New Zealand, Norway, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden, Switzerland, the United Kingdom and the United States. A remix version featuring South Korean band BTS was released on 2 October 2020. == References == Category:2020 songs Category:Jason Derulo songs Category:BTS songs
title: Savage Love (Laxed – Siren Beat)
